DO NOT remove any .rST or custom formatting.
- If you see text wrapped in "{+" and "+}", or "|" leave it as is. E.g. Do not change "{+avs+}", "|fts|", or "|service|".
- Length of the underlines must match the heading length. 

 For example:

 ========
 Header 1
 ========

 Header 2
 --------

 Header 3
 ~~~~~~~~
 
 Header 4
 ````````
